basics.name: Ayushi Jain
basics.label: Senior Data Scientist
basics.summary: A German-born theoretical physicist, widely ranked among the greatest and most influential scientists of all time

work.name: Walmart
work.summary: Contributed to the search domain by leveraging LLMs to enhance query understanding through models like the Specificity Classifier, Query Classification, and Sequence Tagger, while also advancing visual item understanding, resulting in improved item retrieval accuracy, search precision, and overall user experience.

courses: Simulation and Modeling for Engineering and Science

awards.title: Impact Award
awards.summary: Contribution to WCP Intent Understanding project

awards.title: Silver Award - Think Big,Then Make it Happen
Upsilon Pi Epsilon Scholarship
awards.summary: In recognition of my academic excellence in Computer Science in which only 4 students all over the world are selected

awards.title: Best Student of Engineering Award
awards.summary: Awarded for exceptional achievements in undergrad and winning an international competition with students from other institutes

awards.title: Tution-Free Scholarship
awards.summary: 100% scholarship from Mody University for the entire B.Tech program. Among the 25 students out of 800 students selected for the purpose (on the basis of IIT Mains rank)

references.name: Ahmad Haider, PhD
references.reference: Ayushi is a true asset. She is a dedicated worker and a very fast learner. During the time that I worked with her, she rose to accept challenges and solve problems that were new to her. Not only she did solve them, but also suggested ideas of what can be done to improve upon them. She is not afraid to learn new things, and works extra hard to excel at them. Would love to work with you again. Kudos!

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
